form-validation.alpha: This field may only contain alphabetic characters
form-validation.alpha_num: This field may only contain alpha-numeric characters
form-validation.alpha_dash: This field may contain alpha-numeric characters as well as dashes and underscores
form-validation.alpha_spaces: This field may only contain alphabetic characters as well as spaces
form-validation.between: This field must be between 0:{min} and 1:{max}
form-validation.confirmed: This field confirmation does not match
form-validation.digits: This field must be numeric and exactly contain 0:{length} digits
form-validation.dimensions: This field must be 0:{width} pixels by 1:{height} pixels
form-validation.email: This field must be a valid email
form-validation.excluded: This field is not a valid value
form-validation.ext: This field is not a valid file
form-validation.image: This field must be an image
form-validation.integer: This field must be an integer
form-validation.max_value: This field must be 0:{max} or less
form-validation.max: This field may not be greater than 0:{length} characters
form-validation.mimes: This field must have a valid file type
form-validation.min_value: This field must be 0:{min} or more
form-validation.min: This field must be at least 0:{length} characters
form-validation.numeric: This field may only contain numeric characters
form-validation.one_of: This field is not a valid value
form-validation.size: This field size must be less than 0:{size}KB
form-validation.url: This field is not a valid URL
